about_the_game:
This DLC adds several crossover contents with "Adventure Awaits II"

I. New Sect

  • Ganyuan (Disciples are from various martial arts schools, their ideology and realm far exceed ordinary people, being considered nearly divine. Now, they aim to conquer this unfamiliar cultivation world.)

II. New Disciples

  • Jiang Chao
  • Xue He
  • MuXing
  • Bai Shuangming
  • Shen Yangong
  • Jiang Xueqing

III. New Weapon: Broadsword

  • Wind Broadsword (Slightly increases critical damage)
  • Sparrow Broadsword (Moderately increases critical damage)
  • Chisel Broadsword (Significantly increases critical damage)
  • Cangbi Broadsword (Massively increases critical damage)

IV. New Skills

  • Eternal Life (Enhances strength attribute, has multiple area damage abilities, and can create a burning effect on a large area.)
  • Blood Sea (Enhances attack attribute, has multiple area damage abilities, and can counter-attack in desperate situations.)

V. New Building

  • YeJing Passageway (Allows access to special items: YeJing Token)

VI. New Items

  • Food: Jiao Elixir
  • Tea and Liquor: Snake Wine, Sake
  • Special Item: YeJing Token (Opens to obtain a small amount of Spirit Stones, or used as material for synthesizing Jianghu Book)
  • Unknown Secret Manuals: Jianghu Book (Opens to randomly obtain a skill, including Eternal Life & Blood Sea)

VII. New Raiding Events

  • There's a chance to encounter disciples from "Adventure Awaits II" in each city and have a sparring session.

VIII. Other New Content

  • Several new crossover elixirs added
